import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{ServerIP}from'./findServerIP';import"./index.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export let UserName;const App=()=>{const[Username,setUsername]=useState('');const[Password,setPassword]=useState('');const[errorMassege,serErrorMassege]=useState(['',"red"]);const[IP,setIP]=useState("http://localhost:1234");let massege="< 로그인 >";const data={Username,Password};const navigate=useNavigate();const chagePageinMain=()=>{UserName=Username;navigate('/Home');// '/Home' 경로로 이동
};if(ServerIP!=="Searching for server IP.."){setIP("ServerIP");}const login=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await fetch(IP+'/Login',{method:'POST',mode:'cors',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(data)});const result=await res.json();if(result==="NotUserData"){serErrorMassege(["이름 또는 fetch(IP+"/signUp",{method:"POST",mode:"cors",headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(data)});const result=await res.json();if(result==="signUp"){serErrorMassege(['성공적으로 안됩니다.',"red"]);}}catch(err){console.log("ERROR:",err);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"background",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{id:"center",children:massege}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"username",children:"Username:"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"username",name:"username",type:"text",value:Username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Password:"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"password",name:"password",type:"password",value:Password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",type:"submit",onClick:login,children:"\uB85C\uADF8\uC778"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",id:"nextUser",onClick:signUp,children:"\uC2E0\uADDC\uAC00\uC785"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error",style:{color:errorMassege[1]},children:errorMassege[0]})]})})});};export
